```{r, fig.width=6, fig.height=2, fig.align='center'}
library(tidyverse)


scholar::get_citation_history(id = "HMdHkLYAAAAJ") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(year),
             y = cites)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Citations per Year\n(Google Scholar)")
```
